function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High peak demand on critical care beds beyond surge capacity","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, increased mortality due to lack of care","Mitigation":"Increase surge capacity, prioritize high-risk groups for care, implement effective intervention strategy","Technologies":"Telemedicine, predictive modeling, healthcare resource allocation technology","People":"High-risk individuals, healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Relatively little impact of stopping mass gatherings","Impact":"Limited reduction in disease transmission, false sense of security","Mitigation":"Focus on other high-impact interventions, communicate importance of home, school, and workplace precautions","Technologies":"Public health messaging, contact tracing, community engagement platforms","People":"Event organizers, public health authorities, general population","Owner":"Event organizers, public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","Impact":"Uncontrolled disease transmission, high mortality rates, healthcare system crisis","Mitigation":"Implement suppression measures, increase healthcare capacity, prioritize high-risk groups for care","Technologies":"Telemedicine, predictive modeling, healthcare resource allocation technology, surveillance and monitoring systems","People":"High-risk individuals, healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government agencies, public health authorities"}]}
